title: Successful rescue TNF-α blocking for Mycobacterium genavense – Related immune reconstitution inflammatory syndrome: A case report
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Hugo Bes-Berlandier, Margaux Garzaro, Claire Rouzaud, Sylvain Bodard, Emmanuelle Bille, Maxence Ficheux, Dominique Cazals-Hatem, Nicolas Veziris, Fanny Lanternier, Olivier Lortholary
